title: Outlaw of the Wild West... I Shot Billy the Kid 1950 | Western Movie | Colorized

sources.title: Outlaw of the Wild West... I Shot Billy the Kid 1950 | Western Movie | Colorized
sources.description:
TRUE, UNTOLD STORY OF THE OUTLAW TERRORIST! 
Billy the Kid turns down a pardon and continues his descent into outlawry. Leading to the legendary final showdown with lawman Pat Garrett.

Original title: I Shot Billy the Kid (1950)

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/S0L2n6cHCvk

Director: William Berke
Writer: Orville H. Hampton
Stars: Don 'Red' Barry, Robert Lowery, Wally Vernon
Genres: Colorized classic, Western

Summary: Billy the Kid; his Grave, the Card Game, and the Pursuit of Justice in the Lincoln County War

00:00  Full Movie
01:13  The video is about the grave of Billy the Kid and the events leading up to his death in the Lincoln County War.
12:44  Billy the Kid gets into trouble at a card game and is released from jail by his friend Vincente Segura.
19:51  Billy the Kid contemplates his actions and considers a pardon from the governor.
26:10  Francesca tries to convince Billy the Kid to give up his guns and accept amnesty, but he refuses.
33:38  Billy the Kid is pursued by law enforcement and eventually brought to trial for murder.
41:21  Billy the Kid is on the run and his friends are trying to catch him.
50:23  Billy the Kid plans to cross the border into Mexico with his friends, but encounters doubts and obstacles along the way.

@CultCinemaClassics 

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA
